channel.title: Ranging in some barrows gives 50+ hit with mage short
channel.description: when i rang in some barrows (dh; torag) it gives 50+ hit with mage short and rune arrows and with out less then 20 how can i fix this annoying thing ?

item.title: Ranging in some barrows gives 50+ hit with mage short
item.dc:creator: @Zenzo Zenzo
item.description:
@Zenzo wrote:

change the mage short bonus.

item.title: Ranging in some barrows gives 50+ hit with mage short
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

and where i need to put it ?
under this ?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { PkingDelay = 6; wepdelay = 6; UseBow = true; }

also find this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { PkingDelay = 4; wepdelay = 4; UseBow = true; }

and this

if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) { if (LoopAttDelay <= 1) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsDead == true) { ResetAttackNPC(); } else if(!UseBow) { //actionAmount++; setAnimation(GetWepAnim()); if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP;[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 02:37:09 AM[/size][hr]plz i really need it[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 02:41:36 AM[/size][hr]

item.title: Ranging in some barrows gives 50+ hit with mage short
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You change the hit difference.
You could make it random.

Hitdiff = 3 + random(20);

That would make it above 3 but below 20.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranging in some barrows gives 50+ hit with mage short
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You could change the hit difference.
Hold ctrl and f in your client.
Search for the magic short bow identification.
Keep searching it and changing the hit difference to the correct amount.

Read full topic
